amendment.description: Amendment to the Stenholm amendment (A002) sought to extend the forward pricing contract pilot program to include fluid milk.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 3 printed in part B of H.Rept. 106-324 to extend the forward pricing contract pilot program to all classes of milk including fluid milk.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Dooley to the Stenholm amendment (A002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dooley amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 270 (Roll no. 431).
